column4: I don't understand why bug #190848 (blurry fonts in the gnome terminal) has not been fixed, why the importance is low and undecided.  Don't the Ubuntu developers use a terminal to do their work?  Also, this used to work fine until Hardy was released.  Why did they break the fonts for the gnome terminal?
fix "recompile freetype to enable bytecode interpreter" -- wtf?
Please dont use the rude shorthand
